HomePage.testimonialSubTitle: Here are testimonials from clients that we have worked with and are happy to share their opinion about the process and the results.

feedbacks.comment: You guys rock! Thank you for making it painless,have thought of it first. I am really satisfied with my first Smart phone service.
feedbacks.name: Akash Singh

feedbacks.comment: Appzoid did great job with fixing my mobile for a good price. I recommend any body with mobile problems, they will give you excellent service to all his customers.
feedbacks.name: Prashant Aher

feedbacks.comment: I was amazed at the quality of service. I like Appzoid more and more each day because it makes my life a lot easier. Thanks guys, keep up the good work! I recommend Appzoid to everyone.
feedbacks.name: Jai Patil

feedbacks.comment: Keep up the excellent work. Thank you so much for your help. This is simply unbelievable!
feedbacks.name: Om Mishra

AboutUs.FoundersandDirectorsDescription: Our Energetic Directors and Key Management personal who are always focused.

CardElement.Name: Mrs. Tanuja Amrawat
CardElement.description: Mrs. Tanuja Amrawat is the founder of Appzoid who has the work experience of 31 years and had worked with multiple esteemed organizations as of 16 years logistic head for pan India and 15 years in insurance industry mainly specialized in mobile insurance and Affinity Products. Mrs.Tanuja Amrawat is a Graduate and has been working since 1989 with logistic partner at post of In-charge to pan India Head later joined Insurance Industry with ground level post to General manager with esteemed origination and Specialized in Mobile phone Insurance . Also a Ex-member of Business Network International for 3 years where she exchanged the business knowledge with India’s best known Business Tycoons Mrs. Tanuja Amrawat has more number of achievements in the field of Business as well as in Social Services.

CardElement.Name: Mr. Amit Dubey
CardElement.description: Mrs. Tanuja Amrawat is the founder of Appzoid who has the work experience of 31 years and had worked with multiple esteemed organizations as of 16 years logistic head for pan India and 15 years in insurance industry mainly specialized in mobile insurance and Affinity Products.
